short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically adds .eth.limo to search queries. It though first goes through search due to the limitations in browser APIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Entering a period in the browser's URL input box triggers an automatic suffix addition of '.eth.limo
